title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Extra effort, empathy, and patience may be required to understand where someone else is coming from today. Initially, it might be difficult to comprehend what is going on with a loved one as they share their thoughts and plans. Keep in mind that you both could be too crouched in your own feelings and defenses to hear each other with the supersensitive Cancer Moon in the picture. Nevertheless, you can demonstrate your receptivity by remaining quietly attentive and fully present. Musician Alfred Brendel said, The word listen contains the same letters as the word silent.
